product.title: Old MacDonald Farm House Micro Building Block
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Bring the farm to life!

    You can start your own farm, gather fresh produce, and experience life and nature in a unique way. Discover the beauty and joy of farming with this fun, educational, and stimulating building block set. Live the full farm life and create stories and memories to last a lifetime with Old McDonald Farm House Micro Building Block!


    🐮 Measurements: varies for each set
    🐮 Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    🐮 Each set has 899+ micro pieces with mini-dolls
    📦 Options to include the original box


    An excellent gift for those who love animals

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and excellent building blocks today.

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow. 

    Features

    🐮 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🐮 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🐮 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🐮 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

    Micro Blocks: Smaller than the traditional building block.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks is a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

     

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
